description:
You have to create a proper feature Screencast for Self-Service which should explain the features of the app. This screencast will help users in future to learn and get a little overview of the functionality on how to use the app.

Project Link - https://github.com/openMF/mifos-mobile
Demo (for another Mifos Project, last year during GCI) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8RpfL_9BUIM
name: Mifos Self-Service App - Features Screencast
